title: PGP (Pretty Good Privacy)
overview: Phil Zimmermann releases PGP, bringing strong cryptography to the public and fueling the crypto wars.

title: SSL 2.0 Introduced
overview: Netscapeâ€™s SSL 2.0 kickstarts secure web commerce and the modern HTTPS ecosystem.

title: TLS 1.0 Standardized
overview: IETF standardizes TLS 1.0, replacing SSL and forming the basis for secure Internet transport.

title: Mafiaboy DDoS Attacks
overview: High-profile DDoS on Yahoo, CNN, eBay and Amazon exposes Internet resilience gaps.

title: Heartbleed (OpenSSL)
overview: A critical OpenSSL bug allows data leakage across millions of sites; open-source supply chain wake-up call.

title: Mirai Botnet DDoS
overview: IoT devices hijacked to attack Dyn, disrupting major online services globally.

title: Equifax Data Breach
overview: One of the largest consumer data breaches highlights patching and disclosure challenges.

title: Log4Shell (Log4j RCE)
overview: A ubiquitous Java logging library vulnerability triggers a global, multi-year remediation effort.
